options.query:
select 
  (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as id,
  i.name,
  string_agg(i.inv_status, ',') as inv_statuses,
  string_agg(i.owner, ',') as owners,
  sum(i.points) as total_points,
  string_agg(i.key, ',') as keys
 from investigations i
group by name

select 
  concat(t.sprint, '-',t.date) as id,
  t.sprint,
  t.date,
  s.points as tbd_points,
  sum(t.points) as total_points,
  sum(
    case 
      when t.status = 'In Review' then t.points
      else 0
    end
  ) as cr_points,
  sum(
    case 
      when t.status = 'In Test' then t.points
      else 0
    end
  ) as to_val_points,
  sum(
    case 
      when t.status = 'Done' then t.points
      else 0
    end
  ) as done_points,
  sum(
  case 
      when t.labels = 'validation-return' then t.points
      else 0
    end
  ) as validation_returns
from tickets t
inner join sprints_points_tbd_view s on s.sprint = t.sprint
group by t.sprint, t.date

SELECT
  t.sprint as id,
  t.sprint,
  max(t.date) as date
FROM tickets t
group by t.sprint

select 
  concat(r.user, '-', r.tournament_id) as id,
  r.user,
  r.tournament_id,
  sum(points) as points
from users u
inner join results r on r.user = u.id
group by r.user, r.tournament_id

select 
  r.match as id,
  r.match as match_id,
  sum(case 
    when r.homeScore > r.awayScore  then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as home_per,
  sum(case 
    when r.homeScore < r.awayScore  then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as away_per,
  sum(case 
    when r.homeScore = r.awayScore  then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as tie_per
from predictions r
group by r.match

SELECT 
  (row_number() over()) as id,
  p.user,
  m.id as match_id,
  m.tournament as tournament_id,
  p.homeScore as p_home,
  p.awayScore as p_away,
  m.home,
  m.homeScore,
  m.away,
  m.awayScore,
  p.id as prediction_id,
  m.startAtUtc,
  (case 
    when p.homeScore = m.homeScore and p.awayScore = m.awayScore  then 3
    when p.homeScore > p.awayScore and m.homeScore > m.awayScore  then 1
    when p.homeScore < p.awayScore and m.homeScore < m.awayScore  then 1
    when p.homeScore = p.awayScore and m.homeScore = m.awayScore  then 1
    else 0
  end) as points
FROM predictions p
JOIN matches m on m.id = p.match
where m.`startAtUtc` < datetime()

SELECT
  (row_number() over()) as id,
  s.sprint,
  s.utc_date,
  s.date
FROM staffing s
GROUP BY s.sprint, s.utc_date, s.date

SELECT
  (row_number() over()) as id,
  s.sprint,
  s.dev
FROM staffing s
GROUP BY s.sprint, s.dev

select 
  t.sprint as id,
  t.sprint,
  count(t.key) as total,
  sum(
    case when (t.labels like '%wrong%') then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as wrong_count,
  sum(
    case when (t.labels like '%return%') then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as validation_return_count,
  sum(
    case when (t.labels like '%ko%') then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as ko_count,
  sum(
    case when (t.labels like '%estimated%') then 1
    else 0
    end
  ) as underestimated_count
from tickets as t
inner join latest_sprint_snapshot_date_view l on l.date = t.date
where labels like '%wrong%' or labels like '%ko%' or labels like '%return%' or labels like '%underestimated%' or labels like '%missed%'
GROUP BY t.sprint

SELECT
  s.sprint as id,
  s.sprint,
  sum(s.points) as points,
  min(s.date) as start_at,
  max(s.date) as endt_at
FROM staffing s
group by s.sprint

SELECT
  s.sprint as id,
  s.sprint,
  s.date,
  s.tbd_points,
  s.to_val_points,
  s.done_points,
  s.total_points
FROM latest_sprint_points_view s
inner join latest_sprint_snapshot_date_view v on v.sprint = s.sprint and v.date = s.date
